title: Episode 43: The Perils of Power
description: We've all heard the old adage that "power tends to corrupt, and absolute power corrupts absolutely," but psychologist Dacher Keltner at UC Berkeley has found evidence to prove it. His book is The Power Paradox: How We Gain and Lose Influence.
author: ideas@hiddenbrain.org (Hidden Brain Media)
